availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Deaton (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Perry County, Kentucky, native. Son of Mary Deaton. Married to Rebecca Moore Deaton in Perry County, Kentucky, on December 17, 1855. Father of James D. Deaton, Dorcas Deaton, and Drucilla Deaton. Farmer in Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1860.
[Need Confederate compiled service record. Served in the 5th Mounted]

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 337.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, Precinct 2, pp. 403B-404A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994029, Breathitt County Births.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994052, Perry County Marriages.
